(ROOT
  (S
    (S
      (NP (DT The) (NNP Zespri) (NNP Kiwifruit) (NN Season))
      (VP (VBZ is)
        (UCP
          (ADVP (RB now) (RB well))
          (CC and)
          (ADJP (RB truly) (JJ underway)))))
    (CC and)
    (S
      (NP (PRP I))
      (VP (VBP have)
        (VP (VBN been)
          (VP (VBN asked)
            (S
              (VP (TO to)
                (VP (VB be)
                  (NP
                    (NP (NNP Zespri) (NNP Ambassador))
                    (PP (IN for)
                      (NP (DT the) (CD 2009) (NN Season)))))))))))
    (. .)))


det(Season-4, The-1)
nn(Season-4, Zespri-2)
nn(Season-4, Kiwifruit-3)
nsubj(is-5, Season-4)
root(ROOT-0, is-5)
advmod(well-7, now-6)
dep(is-5, well-7)
cc(well-7, and-8)
advmod(underway-10, truly-9)
conj(well-7, underway-10)
cc(is-5, and-11)
nsubjpass(asked-15, I-12)
aux(asked-15, have-13)
auxpass(asked-15, been-14)
conj(is-5, asked-15)
aux(Ambassador-19, to-16)
cop(Ambassador-19, be-17)
nn(Ambassador-19, Zespri-18)
xcomp(asked-15, Ambassador-19)
prep(Ambassador-19, for-20)
det(Season-23, the-21)
num(Season-23, 2009-22)
pobj(for-20, Season-23)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (PP (IN As)
      (NP
        (NP (NN part))
        (PP (IN of)
          (NP (PRP$ my) (NNS duties)))))
    (, ,)))


root(ROOT-0, As-1)
pobj(As-1, part-2)
prep(part-2, of-3)
poss(duties-5, my-4)
pobj(of-3, duties-5)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBD had)
      (S
        (VP (TO to)
          (VP (VB come)
            (PRT (RP up))
            (PP (IN with)
              (NP
                (NP (CD three) (JJ original) (NNP Kiwifruit) (NNS recipes))
                (PP (IN for)
                  (NP (DT the) (NNS media) (NN launch)))))
            (SBAR
              (WHNP (WDT which))
              (S
                (NP (PRP I))
                (VP (VBP am)
                  (VP (VBG posting)
                    (ADVP (RB here))
                    (PP (IN for)
                      (NP (NN everyone))))))))))
      (S
        (VP (TO to)
          (VP (VB try)
            (PP (IN at)
              (NP (NN home)))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(had-2, I-1)
root(ROOT-0, had-2)
aux(come-4, to-3)
xcomp(had-2, come-4)
prt(come-4, up-5)
prep(come-4, with-6)
num(recipes-10, three-7)
amod(recipes-10, original-8)
nn(recipes-10, Kiwifruit-9)
pobj(with-6, recipes-10)
prep(recipes-10, for-11)
det(launch-14, the-12)
nn(launch-14, media-13)
pobj(for-11, launch-14)
dobj(posting-18, which-15)
nsubj(posting-18, I-16)
aux(posting-18, am-17)
ccomp(come-4, posting-18)
advmod(posting-18, here-19)
prep(posting-18, for-20)
pobj(for-20, everyone-21)
aux(try-23, to-22)
xcomp(had-2, try-23)
prep(try-23, at-24)
pobj(at-24, home-25)


(ROOT
  (SBAR (IN As)
    (S
      (NP (PRP I))
      (VP (VBP am)
        (NP
          (NP
            (NP (JJR more))
            (PP (IN of)
              (NP (DT a) (NN home) (NN chef))))
          (CONJP (RB rather) (IN than))
          (NP (DT a) (JJ professional) (NN chef))))
      (, ,))))


mark(more-4, As-1)
nsubj(more-4, I-2)
cop(more-4, am-3)
root(ROOT-0, more-4)
prep(more-4, of-5)
det(chef-8, a-6)
nn(chef-8, home-7)
pobj(of-5, chef-8)
cc(more-4, rather-9)
mwe(rather-9, than-10)
det(chef-13, a-11)
amod(chef-13, professional-12)
conj(more-4, chef-13)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP you))
    (VP (MD will)
      (VP (VB find)
        (SBAR (IN that)
          (S
            (NP (DT these))
            (VP (VBP are)
              (ADVP (RB really))
              (NP (JJ simple) (NNS recipes))
              (SBAR (IN that)
                (S
                  (NP (NN anyone))
                  (VP (MD can)
                    (VP (VB do)
                      (ADVP (IN at) (NN home))
                      (PP (IN with)
                        (NP
                          (NP (NNS ingredients))
                          (SBAR
                            (WHNP (WDT that))
                            (S
                              (VP (VBP are)
                                (ADVP (RB easily))
                                (ADJP (JJ available)
                                  (PP (IN from)
                                    (NP (DT the) (NN supermarket))))))))))))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(find-3, you-1)
aux(find-3, will-2)
root(ROOT-0, find-3)
mark(recipes-9, that-4)
nsubj(recipes-9, these-5)
cop(recipes-9, are-6)
advmod(recipes-9, really-7)
amod(recipes-9, simple-8)
ccomp(find-3, recipes-9)
mark(do-13, that-10)
nsubj(do-13, anyone-11)
aux(do-13, can-12)
ccomp(recipes-9, do-13)
advmod(do-13, at-14)
dep(at-14, home-15)
prep(do-13, with-16)
pobj(with-16, ingredients-17)
nsubj(available-21, that-18)
cop(available-21, are-19)
advmod(available-21, easily-20)
rcmod(ingredients-17, available-21)
prep(available-21, from-22)
det(supermarket-24, the-23)
pobj(from-22, supermarket-24)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBP hope)
      (SBAR
        (S
          (NP (PRP you))
          (VP (MD can)
            (VP
              (VP (VB try)
                (NP (PRP them))
                (PP (IN at)
                  (NP (NN home))))
              (CC and)
              (VP (VB let)
                (S
                  (NP (PRP us))
                  (VP (VB know)
                    (SBAR
                      (WHNP (WP what))
                      (S
                        (NP (PRP you))
                        (VP (VBP think))))))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(hope-2, I-1)
root(ROOT-0, hope-2)
nsubj(try-5, you-3)
aux(try-5, can-4)
ccomp(hope-2, try-5)
dobj(try-5, them-6)
prep(try-5, at-7)
pobj(at-7, home-8)
cc(try-5, and-9)
conj(try-5, let-10)
nsubj(know-12, us-11)
ccomp(let-10, know-12)
dobj(think-15, what-13)
nsubj(think-15, you-14)
ccomp(know-12, think-15)
